thread.title: Jimmy Kimmel Tweets at Trump During Oscars—With a Special Message From Meryl Streep | The Daily Dot
thread.title_full: Jimmy Kimmel Tweets at Trump During Oscars—With a Special Message From Meryl Streep | The Daily Dot

author: Kahron Spearman
title: Jimmy Kimmel Tweets at Trump During Oscars—With a Special Message From Meryl Streep | The Daily Dot
text:
Screengrab via Oscars/ABC BTW 
In a night where the President Trump hits kept on coming, Oscar host Jimmy Kimmel took to POTUS' beloved medium and sent him a tweet. 
He first asked: — Jimmy Kimmel (@jimmykimmel) February 27, 2017 
But then he sent along a message from acclaimed actor Meryl Streep , who’s feuded with 45. — Jimmy Kimmel (@jimmykimmel) February 27, 2017 
Kimmel had already involved Streep in the show, playfully deriding her in Trump-inspired fashion, as earlier this year he claimed that the acclaimed actor was “overrated.” 
In past years, Trump has dismissed the Oscars via Twitter. Up next after the break: Recommendations
